introductions: (...here it comes [Blue])  Hey there good-lookin'! | You're the one looking into the case, right? | Great, good luck with that.
openers: (...speak of the devil.) Welcome back, detective!
Couldn't get enough of me, huh? (sigh)
closers: You, me, the tavern, tonight.  Think about it.
* [Blue]'s zoning out.  You take the chance to leave.
